recipes: Chaque fois que le principe du Coeur est impliqué, je peux gagner de la Vitalité.
Mon coeur bat plus fort, aujourd'hui.
Whenever the principle of the Lantern sheds its light, I may recall additional scraps of knowledge.
Les faits poussiéreux reviennent nettement dans mon cerveau. Pour l'instant du moins.
Moth finds the light in the dark, and so do I.
A half-glimpsed wistfulness has touched me.
Is there something to be learnt from the satisfaction of desire?
I wake in the night. My palms, my face, are beaded with sweat.
Slowly, my clenched fists relax. I'll slide back into sleep. But something remains, like spiderwebs in the corner of the room.
I have begun to notice colours in the world for which I have no name.
I am seeing things I shouldn't. I know this is dangerous. But it's difficult not to long for it.
